languages.text: "Его имя — Ахиллеас Скаландр. Как только мы установим контакт с Даргонусом, я представлю тебя как нов{mf|ого|ую} главу династии. Уверен, что ты оценишь присутствие такого советника среди своих подданных — прислушивайся к его словам хотя бы время от времени".

"His name is Achilleas Scalander. As soon as we contact Dargonus I will introduce you as the new head of the dynasty. I am sure you will appreciate the presence of such an advisor among your subjects, and I suggest you heed his words at least occasionally."
languages.original_text: "Его имя — Ахиллеас Скаландр. Как только мы установим контакт с Даргонусом, я представлю тебя как нов{mf|ого|ую} главу династии. Уверен, что ты оценишь присутствие такого советника среди своих подданных — прислушивайся к его словам хотя бы время от времени".

traits.locale_text: "His name is Achilleas Scalander. As soon as we contact Dargonus I will introduce you as the new dynasty head. I am sure you will appreciate the presence of such an advisor among your subjects and suggest you heed his words at least occasionally."

"His name is Achilleas Scalander. As soon as we contact Dargonus I will introduce you as the new dynasty head. I am sure you will appreciate the presence of such an advisor among your subjects and suggest you heed his words at least occasionally."

"His name is Achilleas Scalander. As soon as we contact Dargonus I will introduce you as the new head of the dynasty. I am sure you will appreciate the presence of such an advisor among your subjects, and I suggest you heed his words at least occasionally."

"His name is Achilleas Scalander. As soon as we contact Dargonus I will introduce you as the new head of the dynasty. I am sure you will appreciate the presence of such an advisor among your subjects, and I suggest you heed his words at least occasionally."

languages.text: «Se llama Achilleas Scalander. En cuanto contactemos con Dargonus, le presentaré como nuev{mf|o|a} jef{mf|e|a} de la dinastía. Seguro que tener semejante asesor entre sus súbditos le resulta útil, así que sugiero que haga caso de sus consejos, aunque sea solo ocasionalmente».
languages.original_text: "His name is Achilleas Scalander. As soon as we contact Dargonus I will introduce you as the new head of the dynasty. I am sure you will appreciate the presence of such an advisor among your subjects, and I suggest you heed his words at least occasionally."

traits.locale_text: «Se llama Achilleas Scalander. En cuanto contactemos con Dargonus, le presentaré como nuev{mf|o|a} jef{mf|e|a} de la dinastía. Seguro que tener semejante asesor entre sus súbditos le resulta útil, así que sugiero que haga caso de sus consejos, aunque sea solo ocasionalmente».

languages.text: “他的名字叫做阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德。等我们与达戈努斯联系上之后，我会向他介绍你是王朝的新领袖。我相信你会乐于看到你的随行人员中出现这样一位顾问，我也建议你至少要偶尔采取他的建议。”
languages.original_text: "His name is Achilleas Scalander. As soon as we contact Dargonus I will introduce you as the new head of the dynasty. I am sure you will appreciate the presence of such an advisor among your subjects, and I suggest you heed his words at least occasionally."

traits.locale_text: “他的名字叫做阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德。等我们与达戈努斯联系上之后，我会向他介绍你是王朝的新领袖。我相信你会乐于看到你的随行人员中出现这样一位顾问，我也建议你至少要偶尔采取他的建议。”

languages.text: 「名前はアキレアス・スカランダー。ダルゴナスと連絡が取れ次第、御身を王朝の新たな長として紹介しましょう。家臣にこういった相談役がいることをきっと感謝することでしょう。せめてたまにはヤツの言葉に耳を傾けてやるといいでしょう」
languages.original_text: "His name is Achilleas Scalander. As soon as we contact Dargonus I will introduce you as the new head of the dynasty. I am sure you will appreciate the presence of such an advisor among your subjects, and I suggest you heed his words at least occasionally."

traits.locale_text: 「名前はアキレアス・スカランダー。ダルゴナスと連絡が取れ次第、御身を王朝の新たな長として紹介しましょう。家臣にこういった相談役がいることをきっと感謝することでしょう。せめてたまにはヤツの言葉に耳を傾けてやるといいでしょう」

languages.text: "Sein Name ist Achilleas Scalander. Sobald wir Dargonus kontaktieren, werde ich Euch als neues Oberhaupt der Dynastie vorstellen. Ich bin sicher, ihr wisst einen derartigen Ratgeber unter Euren Untertanen zu schätzen und schlage vor, dass Ihr seinen Worten zumindest gelegentlich Gehör schenkt."
languages.original_text: "His name is Achilleas Scalander. As soon as we contact Dargonus I will introduce you as the new head of the dynasty. I am sure you will appreciate the presence of such an advisor among your subjects, and I suggest you heed his words at least occasionally."

traits.locale_text: "Sein Name ist Achilleas Scalander. Sobald wir Dargonus kontaktieren, werde ich Euch als neues Oberhaupt der Dynastie vorstellen. Ich bin sicher, ihr wisst einen derartigen Ratgeber unter Euren Untertanen zu schätzen und schlage vor, dass Ihr seinen Worten zumindest gelegentlich Gehör schenkt."

languages.text: « Il se nomme Achilleas Scalander. Dès que nous pourrons contacter Dargonus, je vous présenterai à lui en tant que {mf|nouveau|nouvelle} chef de la dynastie. Je suis sûr que vous serez {mf|reconnaissant|reconnaissante} de la présence d'un tel conseiller parmi vos sujets, et je vous suggère d'écouter ses recommandations au moins de temps en temps. »
languages.original_text: "His name is Achilleas Scalander. As soon as we contact Dargonus I will introduce you as the new head of the dynasty. I am sure you will appreciate the presence of such an advisor among your subjects, and I suggest you heed his words at least occasionally."

traits.locale_text: « Il se nomme Achilleas Scalander. Dès que nous pourrons contacter Dargonus, je vous présenterai à lui en tant que {mf|nouveau|nouvelle} chef de la dynastie. Je suis sûr que vous serez {mf|reconnaissant|reconnaissante} de la présence d'un tel conseiller parmi vos sujets, et je vous suggère d'écouter ses recommandations au moins de temps en temps. »

languages.text: "İsmi Achilleas Scalander. Dargonus'la iletişime geçer geçmez seni hanedanlığın yeni başı olarak takdim edeceğim. Eminim sen de tebaan arasında öyle bir danışman olmasından hoşnut kalacaksındır. Sözlerini de ara sıra dinlemeni tavsiye ederim."
languages.original_text: "His name is Achilleas Scalander. As soon as we contact Dargonus I will introduce you as the new head of the dynasty. I am sure you will appreciate the presence of such an advisor among your subjects, and I suggest you heed his words at least occasionally."

traits.locale_text: "İsmi Achilleas Scalander. Dargonus'la iletişime geçer geçmez seni hanedanlığın yeni başı olarak takdim edeceğim. Eminim sen de tebaaların arasında öyle bir danışman olmasından hoşnut kalacaksındır. Sözlerini de ara sıra dinlemeni tavsiye ederim."
